Create free trial Office 365 E5 tenancy (if you don't want to experiment in your production tenancy)

objectives_summary: How to efficiently measure Freemium products using Key Performance Indicators

items.title: iOS Push Notifications: Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Everything you could ever want to know about push notifications for iOS 11 in Swift
objectives_summary: Implement Local Notifications on iOS
Implement push notifications with CloudKit & iCloud
Implement push notifications with AWS

items.title: Firebase Firestore for iOS
items.headline: Learn all about the brand new Firestore, a NoSQL document based technology
objectives_summary: Add, edit and delete data from a Firestore database
Implement powerful login capabilities into your apps using Firebase Authentication
Add Firestore security features to protect your database and restrict access to authorized users only

items.title: Using Advanced iOS Frameworks and Techniques with Swift 3
items.headline: Learn and Master the Coolest iOS Frameworks and Techniques by Example
objectives_summary: leverage the power of multiple great frameworks like UIKit Dynamics or the Photos framework
use Xcode live rendering to improve productivity
deal with live photos

items.title: Automate Your React Native Releases with Fastlane & Bitrise
items.headline: Learn step-by-step how to release your React Native applications into Stores automatically by using Fastlane & Bitrise.
objectives_summary: If you are a newcomer to React Native, you will learn how to create a very simple React Native application using react-native-cli and configure it for further development
You will also learn, what Fastlane is and how to configure it for both iOS and Android projects to automatically upload your builds into Stores
You will find out what is Bitrise, its basic building blocks and how to set up proper Workflow to automate the release process with Fastlane

How to build your own realistic models such as Tv, paintings
Learn to build a well furnished house interior with beautiful wallpapers and wooden flooring

items.title: Hacking with watchOS 5 - Build Amazing Apple Watch Apps
items.headline: The Hacking with watchOS tutorial series is designed to make it easy for beginners to get started coding for watchOS 5
objectives_summary: Place your own amazing watch apps into the hands of thousands of people through the Watch App Store
Become completely proficient with Swift 4.2 and watchOS app development
